languages.text: {n}Флейтист смущенно поправляет защитные очки на лбу.{/n} "О простом парне с нижних палуб, честном перед собой и другими. Рискуя жизнью, он защищает притесненных от тех, кого извратила власть. Берет у богатых и отдает нуждающимся. Помогает и ничего не просит взамен. Таков Немезит, герой сказок, о котором и взрослые любят мечтать".

{n}The flute player awkwardly adjusts the goggles on his forehead.{/n} "The story of a simple man from the lower decks, honest with himself and others. He risks his life to protect the oppressed from those corrupted by power. He takes from the rich and gives to the needy. He helps without asking anything in return. Nemesite, hero of tales, admired by children and grown folk alike."
languages.original_text: {n}Флейтист смущенно поправляет защитные очки на лбу.{/n} "О простом парне с нижних палуб, честном перед собой и другими. Рискуя жизнью, он защищает притесненных от тех, кого извратила власть. Берет у богатых и отдает нуждающимся. Помогает и ничего не просит взамен. Таков Немезит, герой сказок, о котором и взрослые любят мечтать".

traits.locale_text: {n}The flute player adjusts the goggles on his forehead awkwardly.{/n} "It's about a simple man from the lower decks, honest to himself and others. He risks his life to protect the oppressed from those corrupted by power. He takes from the rich and gives to the needy. He helps without asking anything in return. That is Nemesite, the hero of tales admired by more than just children."

languages.text: {n}D'un air embarrassé, le joueur de flûte ajuste les lunettes sur son front.{/n} « L'histoire d'un homme simple des ponts inférieurs qui a fait de l'honnêteté un principe de vie. L'histoire d'un homme qui risque sa peau pour protéger les opprimés de ceux que le pouvoir a corrompus. L'histoire d'un homme qui prend aux riches pour donner aux pauvres. L'histoire d'un homme qui aide sans rien demander en retour. Némésite, le héros, idole des enfants aussi bien que de leurs parents. »
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player awkwardly adjusts the goggles on his forehead.{/n} "The story of a simple man from the lower decks, honest with himself and others. He risks his life to protect the oppressed from those corrupted by power. He takes from the rich and gives to the needy. He helps without asking anything in return. Nemesite, hero of tales, admired by children and grown folk alike."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un air embarrassé, le joueur de flûte ajuste les lunettes sur son front.{/n} « L'histoire d'un homme simple des ponts inférieurs qui a fait de l'honnêteté un principe de vie. L'histoire d'un homme qui risque sa peau pour protéger les opprimés de ceux que le pouvoir a corrompus. L'histoire d'un homme qui prend aux riches pour donner aux pauvres. L'histoire d'un homme qui aide sans rien demander en retour. Némésite, le héros, idole des enfants aussi bien que de leurs parents. »

languages.text: {n}El flautista se ajusta las gafas que lleva en la frente.{/n} «Es la historia de un sencillo morador de las cubiertas inferiores, honrado consigo mismo y con el prójimo. Arriesga su vida para proteger a los oprimidos de quienes se dejan corromper por el poder. Roba a los ricos para dárselo a los necesitados. Presta ayuda sin pedir nada a cambio. Se trata de Nemesitio, héroe de leyenda al que niños y adultos admiran por igual».
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player awkwardly adjusts the goggles on his forehead.{/n} "The story of a simple man from the lower decks, honest with himself and others. He risks his life to protect the oppressed from those corrupted by power. He takes from the rich and gives to the needy. He helps without asking anything in return. Nemesite, hero of tales, admired by children and grown folk alike."

traits.locale_text: {n}El flautista se ajusta las gafas que lleva en la frente.{/n} «Es la historia de un sencillo morador de las cubiertas inferiores, honrado consigo mismo y con el prójimo. Arriesga su vida para proteger a los oprimidos de quienes se dejan corromper por el poder. Roba a los ricos para dárselo a los necesitados. Presta ayuda sin pedir nada a cambio. Se trata de Nemesitio, héroe de leyenda al que niños y adultos admiran por igual».

languages.text: {n}フルート吹きはモタモタと額のゴーグルを調整する。{/n}「自分にも他人にも正直な、下層階級の素朴な男の物語です。彼は、権力に溺れた者たちから虐げられる者たちを守るため命を賭けます。富める者から奪い、貧しい者に与える。見返りを求めずに助けるのです。物語の英雄はネメサイト、子供にも大人にも慕われています」
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player awkwardly adjusts the goggles on his forehead.{/n} "The story of a simple man from the lower decks, honest with himself and others. He risks his life to protect the oppressed from those corrupted by power. He takes from the rich and gives to the needy. He helps without asking anything in return. Nemesite, hero of tales, admired by children and grown folk alike."

traits.locale_text: {n}フルート吹きはモタモタと額のゴーグルを調整する。{/n}「自分にも他人にも正直な、下層階級の素朴な男の物語です。彼は、権力に溺れた者たちから虐げられる者たちを守るため命を賭けます。富める者から奪い、貧しい者に与える。見返りを求めずに助けるのです。物語の英雄はネメサイト、子供にも大人にも慕われています」

languages.text: {n}吹笛人笨拙地调整了一下额头上的护目镜。{/n}“这支曲子讲述的是一个来自底层甲板的普通人。他对自己、对他人都很诚实。他劫富济贫，会冒着生命危险保护那些被压迫者，让他们免受被权力腐化之人的迫害。他无私地帮助别人，不求任何回报。他就是传说中的英雄涅墨斯特，孩子们和成年人都很崇拜他。”
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player awkwardly adjusts the goggles on his forehead.{/n} "The story of a simple man from the lower decks, honest with himself and others. He risks his life to protect the oppressed from those corrupted by power. He takes from the rich and gives to the needy. He helps without asking anything in return. Nemesite, hero of tales, admired by children and grown folk alike."

traits.locale_text: {n}吹笛人笨拙地调整了一下额头上的护目镜。{/n}“这支曲子讲述的是一个来自底层甲板的普通人。他对自己、对他人都很诚实。他劫富济贫，会冒着生命危险保护那些被压迫者，让他们免受被权力腐化之人的迫害。他无私地帮助别人，不求任何回报。他就是传说中的英雄涅墨斯特，孩子们和成年人都很崇拜他。”

languages.text: {n}Der Flötenspieler rückt verlegen die Brille auf seiner Stirn zurecht.{/n} "Die Geschichte eines einfachen Mannes von den unteren Decks, ehrlich zu sich selbst und anderen. Er riskiert sein Leben, um die Unterdrückten vor jenen zu schützen, die von der Macht verderbt sind. Er nimmt von den Reichen und gibt es den Bedürftigen. Er hilft, ohne etwas dafür zu verlangen. Nemesit, Held von Legenden, von Kindern und Erwachsenen gleichermaßen bewundert."
languages.original_text: {n}The flute player awkwardly adjusts the goggles on his forehead.{/n} "The story of a simple man from the lower decks, honest with himself and others. He risks his life to protect the oppressed from those corrupted by power. He takes from the rich and gives to the needy. He helps without asking anything in return. Nemesite, hero of tales, admired by children and grown folk alike."
